attributes.title: Scamming lying piece of trash
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to support our pedophilic rapist of a president, however the app did not stop glitching and bugging out when I tried to find out when the next rally would be. Then when I was trying to buy off some of his cult-merchandise the store SCAMMED me and took all of my money from my card! Like why does a millionaire even need donations in the first place. This is sick. I renounce this app and that cheeto man and all that support his idiocy.

attributes.title: Itâ€™s a no from me

Not to mention my cat chocked on his own vomit upon accident viewing the image. DO NOT RECOMMEND,THIS APP CAN CAUSE FATALITIES APPLE REMOVE IT IMMEDIATELY!
